com.paydiant.android.ui.service.transaction

Interface ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITransactionRetrievalListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter

    public interface ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener
extends ITransactionRetrievalListener
    Listener interface that can be used to retrieve transaction information with split tender details.

    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Since:
    3.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    ITransactionRetrievalListener, TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter
